subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Last season, the Philadelphia Flyers finished last in the N.H.L. with the worst record in their 40-year history. But this season, they have been first among the turnaround teams.
snippet: Last season, the Philadelphia Flyers finished last in the N.H.L. with the worst record in their 40-year history. But this season, they have been first among the turnaround teams.
